name.value: Star Fleet Battles: Module R10 â€“ The New Cruisers

item.description:
Part of the Star Fleet Battles Captain's Edition line.

They said it would never be done, but here it is! Module R10 includes new plasma torpedo options and variants of the New Heavy Cruisers, giving all of those War Cruiser Variants increased combat power and survival.

Plasma Torpedo upgrades:


 Plasma Sabot - a faster plasma torpedo
 ECM Plasma - a torpedo that generates supporting ECM
 Plasma Carronade - a new way of firing a plasma bolt


There are 79 new ships including:


 Federation New Command Cruiser
 New Strike Carrier
 New Fast Cruiser
 New Drone Cruiser
 New Survey Cruiser
 New Division Control Ship
 New Cruiser Leader
 New Heavy Fighter Carrier
 New Heavy Scout
 New Aegis Escort



 Klingon New Heavy Cruiser Leader
 New Strike Carrier
 New Fast Heavy Cruiser
 New Drone Bombardment Cruiser
 New Survey Cruiser
 New Fast Patrol Tender
 New Division Control Ship
 New Penal Cruiser
 New Heavy Scout Cruiser
 New Diplomatic Cruiser
 New Escort Cruiser
 New Mauler Cruiser
 New Commando Cruiser
 New Drone Cruiser
 New Stasis Cruiser



 Romulan FireHawk-B carrier
 Firehawk-E PF tender
 FireHawk-S Scout
 RegalHawk-B carrier
 RegalHawk-E PF tender
 RegalHawk-C Scout
 FlameHawk-P true mauler
 New Heavy KR
 New Heavy KR Scout
 New Heavy KR Carrier



 Kzinti New Command Cruiser
 New Strike Carrier
 New Fast Cruiser
 New Scout Cruiser
 New Command Cruiser
 New Drone Cruiser
 New Survey Cruiser
 Heavy PF Tender
 New Division Control Ship
 New Escort Cruiser



 Gorn Fast Medium Cruiser
 Medium Survey Cruiser
 Medium Fast Patrol Tender
 Medium Commando Cruiser
 Medium Division Control Ship
 Medium Carrier
 Medium Scout Cruiser
 Heavy Destroyer Dreadnought



 Tholian New Heavy Cruiser 
 New Photon Cruiser



 Orion Heavy Battle Carrier
 Heavy Battle PF Tender



 Hydran New Command Cruisers
 New Medium Carrier
 New Fast Cruiser
 New Survey Cruiser
 Medium PF Tender
 Division Control Ship
 New Tug
 Heavy Escort Cruiser
 Heavy Scout Carrier



 Andromedan Conqueror (their only three-engined ship!)



 Lyran New Command Cruiser
 New Fast Cruiser
 New Survey Cruiser
 New Heavy PF Tender
 New Division Control Ship
 New Mauler Cruiser



 ISC New Heavy Cruiser
 New Strike Cruiser



 LDR New Command Cruiser
 New Strike Carrier



 Seltorian New Heavy Cruiser
 New Strike Carrier. 


Also included are counters and scenarios.
